name: Heritage Game Jam 2020 - The MRT Engineer
name_original: Heritage Game Jam 2020 - The MRT Engineer
description:
Singapore's MRT - connecting every
nook and cranny of Singapore since 1987.

A true symbol of Singapore,
connecting people from all around our tiny island!
Helping us get to school, to work, to places to have fun!
But what goes on behind the scenes...?

Play as The MRT Engineer as they ensure all of the MRT's operations run smoothly!

Made with Unity.
